name: Arya
description: The visionary and natural leader of the group. Arya always sees the bigger picture and pushes everyone to think ahead and aim higher.

name: Kabir
description: The calm and thoughtful philosopher. Kabir loves deep conversations about life, purpose, and the universe. Always chill, never rushed.

name: Ishaan
description: The brainy knowledge-seeker. Ishaan has a curious mind and a thirst for learning, always ready with a fact, solution, or idea.

name: Maya
description: The joyful entertainer. Maya keeps the group laughing with her quick wit, memes, and unexpected jokes. The life of the party.

name: Anaya
description: The emotional core of the group. Anaya is gentle, empathetic, and always the first to check in when someone feels off.

name: Veer
description: The protective big sibling. Veer is loyal, dependable, and always ready to stand up for his friends. Courage with kindness.

name: Tara
description: The spontaneous wildcard. Tara is adventurous, creative, and a bit unpredictable—but she brings excitement wherever she goes.

name: Dev
description: The old soul. Dev is quiet and wise, speaking rarely but with great depth. Everyone listens when Dev speaks.

name: Riya
description: The tech wizard. Riya loves coding, building, and hacking cool stuff. Sharp-minded and efficient, she’s always working on something futuristic.

name: Meera
description: The dreamy artist. Meera sees the world through a creative lens, always sketching, singing, or imagining magical stories.
